incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delay to Smart Network in Philippines

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Smart Network in Philippines . Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Smart Network in Philippines . Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: Inbound Call Failures to a Subset of Twilio Phone Numbers in Porto Alegre Brazil

incident_updates.body: We have identified that the issue causing to inbound call failures for a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Porto Alegre Brazil, is due to extreme weather conditions. We are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve this issue and will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have identified that the issue causing to inbound call failures for a subset of Twilio phone numbers in Porto Alegre Brazil, is due to extreme weather conditions. We are actively working with our carrier partner to resolve this issue and will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

Our SMS carrier partner in Australia is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 May 2024 at 07:15 PDT until 13 May 2024 at 08:15 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS from Australia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Multiple Destination Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and France is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 13 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures to Twilio Germany, and to and from France phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

13 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 13 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT
15 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 15 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT
21 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 21 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT
23 May 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 May 2024 at 19:00 PDT

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 13 May 2024 at 14:00 PDT until 13 May 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body:
The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 13 May 2024 at 16:00 PDT until 15 May 2024 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Bouygues Telecom France handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

13 May 2024 at 16:00 PDT until 13 May 2024 at 23:00 PDT
15 May 2024 at 16:00 PDT until 15 May 2024 at 23:00 PDT
